articles.author: Rafi Letzter
articles.title: Two satellites might collide at 32,000 mph over the Arctic today - Livescience.com
articles.description: There's a 20% chance of a disastrous collision, according to the European Union.
articles.content: There's a one-in-five chance of two large satellites colliding at a relative velocity of 32,679 mph (52,592 km/h) over the Siberian Arctic Friday (April 9) an event that would scatter 2.1 tons (1,900… [+2752 chars]

articles.title: Canon announces the CJ17ex6.2B – a 4K-capable BCTV lens with wide focal length range - Guardian
articles.description: Responding to the growing requirement for broadcasters to upgrade from HD to 4K, and the need for a 4K workflow to suit a range of budgets, Canon Europe (www.Canon-Europe.com) today announces the launch of the CJ17ex6.2B. This versatile, compact, lightweight …
